name: Life of Joe
description:
Game Title: The Life of "Joe"

Theme: Rhythm Runner

Team Name: SGDA1

Member names: Phuong Huynh, Shicheng Zhou, Benjamin Wong, Brandon Barnes

Affiliated Universities: University of Texas at Dallas, Texas AM

Description: "Joe" takes his work very seriously. In this Rhythm-Runner guide "Joe" as he weaves his way through the office in his own unique style, and be aware of the dangerous (and ridiculous) obstacles in his path. How serious are you willing to work?

Required devices: Keyboard, Monitor, Computer, Headphones
